titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Blood Donors Coordinating Council (University of Michigan) records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Blood Donors Coordinating Council (University of Michigan) records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: University of Michigan unit responsible for coordinating and scheduling blood drives on campus in conjunction with the Red Cross. Predecessor unit was University of Michigan Blood Donors Association established in 1954.
archdesc.scopecontent: Planning material, newsletters, reports and scheduling records, relating to efforts to collect blood donations and acknowledge donors. Records mainly from Margaret Rowry, a campus blood drive coordinator.
